parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS hydraulic modulator assembly can cause the loss of front or rear brakes, leading to accidents or loss of control, especially during sudden stops or emergency braking situations.
symptoms: Sudden loss of front or rear brakes
brake pedal or lever feels stiff or hard to press
brake pedal or lever becomes stuck
ABS light does not illuminate despite brake failure

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Rear Brake Shudder and Inadequate Braking Power
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The rear brake shudder and inadequate braking power can cause loss of control, especially during sudden stops or emergency braking situations, and may lead to accidents.
symptoms: pulsing or shuddering sensation when applying the rear brake

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Brake Fluid Issues and ABS Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Brake fluid issues can cause ABS failure, leading to the loss of brakes, especially during sudden stops or emergency braking situations, and may lead to accidents.
symptoms: brake pedal or lever feels stiff or hard to press
brake pedal or lever becomes stuck.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the front wheel bearing can cause the front end to wobble, making it difficult to control the motorcycle, which can lead to accidents or loss of life.
symptoms: and the rider may lose control.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the compensator can cause the rear wheel to lock up, leading to a loss of control and potential accidents, which can result in serious injury or loss of life.
symptoms: Loud metallic noises or banging sounds coming from the primary (compensator sprocket)

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transmission case bolt can cause transmission oil to leak onto the hot muffler bracket, potentially leading to a fire.
symptoms: bolt backing out of transmission case.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the front wheel bearing can cause the wheel to seize or lock up, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potentially catastrophic consequences, especially at high speeds.
